title: pxlTextGenerator
description:
pxlTextGenerator 2018-2019
    Text to handwriting generator
    Language - Python / PyQt
    
    
    Created to capture the personality of one of my characters, Diece; the very one who lives in the cabin of Metal-Asylum.

media.caption: Page builder using your selected characters
Gather your library of characters from photos/scans/images, They'll save to disk as you work on your project.
Quickly see sizing tweaks in the Textbed
Build your pages for export to PNG Supports multiple pages, which save with your project + settings to disk
